verbose_text: Although intramuscular acidosis has been argued to have a minimal effect on performance [XREF_BIBR], sodium bicarbonate is known to increase pH and bicarbonate concentration [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], which has persisted as the most likely mechanism of performance enhancement [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: sodium bicarbonate is known to increase pH and bicarbonate
